TopicTitle: No experience gain from orbiting Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I just started a new Career mode yesterday in 1.0.5 (Steam updated install), and even though I've been to LKO, HKO, and all over the place, Jeb is stuck at 1 EXP, and level 0. He planted a flag near KSC after an early flight. I wonder if this is a bug in KSP, none of my mods are supposed to do anything with EXP or Kerbals at all...

My current mods:

  • StageRecovery 1.5.8
  • RealChute 1.3.2.4
  • Procedural Fairings 3.15
  • Procedural Fairings for everything 0.1.1
  • Module manager 2.6.13
  • ModularFlightIntegrator 1.1.2
  • Kerbulator 0.34.5
  • Firespitter Core 7.1.5
  • FAR 3:0.15.5.2

Player.log

Edited November 12, 2015 by S1gmoid

Sorry, false alarm.. After reading up on the net, and checking the savefile, it seems that even though I achieved stable orbit, I didn't fly a full circle around the planet, so the game treated it as a sub-orbital flight... After doing a longer orbital stay, I got the EXP for it.
